GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v6.1.7
GSD.description:
drm/msm/dpu: Fix memory leak in msm_mdss_parse_data_bus_icc_path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.7 by commit c6fa1de83fd87267ab24359e6fa52f98f5cee3f9, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit b9364eed9232f3d2a846f68c2307eb25c93cc2d0. For more details please see the references link.
